inclusion.criterion: Histological confirmation of either glioblastoma, IDH wildtype (GBM), anaplastic astrocytoma, IDH wildtype (AA) or non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine

inclusion.criterion: EGFR Status: GBM/AA must have EGFR amplification and/or EGFRvIII mutation
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Previous treatments: Patients with GBM/AA must have been previously treated with radiation and temozolomide
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has received field radiation t10-l1 followed by 11 cycles of temozolomide

inclusion.criterion: Radiographic progression: Patients with GBM/AA must have radiographic progression based on RANO criteria
inclusion.label: unknown
met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has a tumor located in the T-L spine, unresectable anaplastic astrocytoma

exclusion.criterion: Any cytotoxic chemotherapy or other anticancer drugs for the treatment of advanced NSCLC from a previous treatment regimen =< 14 days prior to registration
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Radiation therapy to the brain =< 12 weeks prior to registration
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient's EGFR status is unknown, and radiographic progression based on RANO criteria is also unknown. However, overall assessment is likely eligible due to the presence of measurable disease and previous treatments.
